resources.string: "Jerin PowerGuru da ake lura da, tsawon ran batur na raguwa yayin budewa"
"Za a cire dukkanin APN da aka kara,kuma za a sake saita sauran APN din zuwa saitin ainahi.An tabbatar a ci gaba?"
"Yanayin kunna Sim zai canzu, tabbatar kan ko a ci gaba?"
"An hada da USB connected, binciki raba intanet ta USB-PC"
"Isa ga intanet ta USB PC an kunna"
"Ba zai raba intanet ba idan ana amfani da ma\'ajiyar USB"

"1.Bude yanayin sadarwar Windows PC.

2.A yanayin sadarwar da kake so ka raba ka danna damar ka zabi siffofi.

3.Danna zabi na gaba, zabi kyale sauran masu amfani da yanayin sadarwar su raba intanet daga wannan kwamfuta su hadu da ' (Idan zabin yanayin sadarwar gida ya bayyana, zabi haduwar sabon yanayin sadarwar USB)."
"Yayin da aka bada damar Bluetooth ko ake kunna shi, softap ba zai iya aiki ba, idan kana son amfani da softap, tabbatar an kashe Bluetooth."
"Madaidaiciyar tashar aiki ta Wi-Fi tana bukatar jonin datar tafi-da-gidanka, zai haifar da karin cajin kudi."
"Idan an kunna madanni mai sauki ko lalube, bulutu ba zai yi aiki ba, idan kana son yin aiki da bulutut ka tabbata an kashe madannai mai sauki."
"Zai dauki akalla minti 1 a samu gyaran GPS. Banda wannan, GPS zai gaza ba da lokaci saboda ranunin yanayin sigina.\n\nKa tabbata kana son amfani da lokacin da GPS ya samar?"

"Don amfani da lokacin da GPS ya samar, dole ka kunna GPS tukuna. Yana daukar akalla minti 1 a samu gyaran GPS. Banda wannan, GPS zai iya gaza ba da lokaci saboda raunin yanayin sigina. \n\nKa tabbatar kana son kunna GPS yanzu kuma ka jira lokacin da GPS ya samar?"
"Yi amfani da yanayin \'caji kadai\' yayin da a ka jona USB"
"Ko a ba da dama ga masarrafai a yanayin sadarwa na daban."
"Yanayin sadarwar da aka yi wa rajista"
"Amfani da AGPS zai janyo cin kudin yawon kasashen waje in ka zabi duk yanayin sadarwa a zabin ba da dama ga AGPS, idan wayarka na kan yawon kasashen waje."
